text: Pooh's Heffalump Movie is a 2005 American animated musical adventure comedy film released by Walt Disney Pictures, featuring characters from A.A. Milne's Winnie-the-Pooh stories. A sequel, Pooh's Heffalump Halloween Movie, was released direct-to-video on September 13, 2005. == Cast == * Jim Cummings as Winnie-the-Pooh / Tigger * John Fiedler as Piglet * Nikita Hopkins as Roo * Kath Soucie as Kanga * Ken Sansom as Rabbit * Peter Cullen as Eeyore * Kyle Stanger as Lumpy the Heffalump * Brenda Blethyn as Mama Heffalump According to the ending credits, additional voices were provided by voice actress Tara Strong. Category:2005 movies Category:Disney animated movies Category:Movies about animals Category:Movies about elephants Category:Sequel movies
title: Pooh's Heffalump Movie
